Html:
It looks like Virtual Earth requires credentials/Key and I was wondering where I need to change this in the project. 

I've signed up to get a Virtual Earth key.  

Thank you.

I've added the ApplicationId="Account ID" Token="mypassword"  to the xaml file in <d3:VEImageryRoadServer  tag


<d3:Map Name="map">
				<d3:VEImageryRoadServer ApplicationId="5digitnumber" Token="Mypassword" />
			</d3:Map>


but still get the authentication error.

I've used those credentials and am able to authenticate with the webservice

http://dev.virtualearth.net/webservices/v1/metadata/imageryservice/imageryservice.wsdl

I've signed up at

https://mappoint-css.live.com/CSCV3/Css.aspx


The info relates to bing,  I'm guessing it's just branding. 


Thanks in advance.
